attributes.action: Make ALL nazi flags illegal to own in the UK. Excluding use in education.
attributes.additional_details: It’s disgustingly racist, unless it’s being used for educational purposes to expose the horrific past and to grow from it, it should be illegal for this flag to be hung or shown anywhere across the UK. Homes included, especially when they are being posted on social media.
attributes.background: Ban the ownership of any and ALL Nazi flags across the UK. Excluding museums etc.
